name: Retrieve list of Customer CJA Folio Documents for a Customer whos documents are stored as TIFFs in Jaguar

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930760611000"

When I view the Customer CJA Folio for CIF Key
| cifKey |
| 0100000930760611000 |

Then the following Customer CJA Folio data should be returned
| folioNumber | filePath | batchDate |
| CJA00001975 | -348875519 | 2003-08-27 |
| CJA00001975 | -2067413798 | 2003-08-25 |
| CJA00001975 | -2107640069 |  |
| CJA00001975 | -360472701 |  |

children.description: Validate customer cja folio details: | folioNumber | filePath | batchDate | | CJA00001975 | -348875519 | 2003-08-27 | | CJA00001975 | -2067413798 | 2003-08-25 | | CJA00001975 | -2107640069 | | | CJA00001975 | -360472701 | |
